divs: sighting details"going east down lighting ridge.the hill about 500ft-were about 1\2 way down hill,when two bright blue white lites struck us.we watched it for about 10 sec.then it lifted with the lights slightly raised.it lifted and went south."
Summary: A disc type object,approx.75 feet in diameter with a bright light on both edges
trends: There have been no other sightings in Watts
This sighting has never been favorited.
